column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Order your pizza as you arrive and put your name in for a table. Approach the bar and see who's ready to go. If you get bar seats you can have your pizza there (salad has to be ordered at the bar or table
column3: but it's fast). If you get a table
column4: at least your wait is not twice as long (because a deep dish pizza takes about 40 min to be ready).
